each and every one of us has to decide for ourselves. What way are you going to resurrect?
What way is going to get you to God? Is it through Jesus? Or like the high priest, the religious
leaders are you trying to find another way? Let's pray. Lord, we thank you for this
account which tells us what was happening, what you did, your power, and the more importantly,
the message. Neither is there salvation in any other. There is no other name under heaven given
among men whereby we must be saved. May we be bold, may we be diligent, may we be faithful with
that message, and may we take it to a lost and dying world, people that are confused,
looking for the ways and can't find them. Lord, may we get the message, we never stop trying to be
faithful to take that message to all these people that you love, that there is a way, and it is
through Jesus. So we pray for everyone here today. There's anyone that hasn't trusted in Jesus,
may they repent of their sins, and may they ask for your forgiveness, that you died for them,
and that you rose again, and you have the way to eternal life through faith in Him,
bring somebody to that saving faith today. We pray this in Jesus' name. Amen.
